route_caminoinca.title: Inca Trail to Machu Picchu
route_caminoinca.descShort: A unique experience following the footsteps of the ancient Incas.
route_caminoinca.descLong: The Inca Trail is considered one of the most spectacular treks in the world...

1.title: Day 1: Cusco - Km 82 - Wayllabamba
1.text: Early departure from Cusco towards Km 82...

2.title: Day 2: Wayllabamba - Warmiwañusca Pass - Pacaymayo
2.text: The most challenging day of the route...

4.title: Day 4: Wiñay Wayna - Machu Picchu - Cusco
4.text: Departure before dawn towards Inti Punku...

reviews.r1: An incredible trek. The sunrise at Machu Picchu is unforgettable.
reviews.r3: Excellent trek, though physically demanding. The organization was perfect.
reviews.r4: Best travel experience of my life. Challenging but rewarding.
reviews.r5: Simply perfect. The combination of nature, history and adventure is unbeatable.

route_patagonia.title: Trekking in Patagonia
route_patagonia.descShort: Explore the spectacular landscapes of Patagonia with views to Fitz Roy.
route_patagonia.descLong: Trekking in Patagonia is a unique experience in one of South America's wildest and most beautiful corners. With towering mountains, glaciers and crystal lakes, the region offers pure adventure for hiking lovers.

1.title: Day 1: Arrival to El Chaltén
1.text: We arrive to El Chaltén and do a short acclimatization hike.

2.title: Day 2: Laguna de los Tres
2.text: Excursion to Laguna de los Tres with spectacular views of Fitz Roy.

3.title: Day 3: Ascent to Fitz Roy
3.text: Challenging ascent rewarded with unforgettable panoramic views.

4.title: Day 4: Laguna Torre
4.text: Hike to Laguna Torre with views of Cerro Torre.

5.title: Day 5: Return
5.text: Final trekking day before return to civilization.

reviews.r1: Absolutely breathtaking. Fitz Roy is even more spectacular in person.
reviews.r2: An adventure I'll never forget. Patagonia has something magical.
reviews.r3: Very good experience, although the third day was tough. Campsites are comfortable.

route_balcanes.title: Balkans Route
route_balcanes.descShort: Discover the beauty of the Balkans visiting Bosnia, Croatia, Montenegro and Albania.
route_balcanes.descLong: The Balkans Route takes you through some of Europe's most beautiful and less explored countries. Beaches, mountains and millenary culture in one adventure.

1.title: Day 1: Sarajevo
1.text: Explore the Bosnian capital with its fascinating history and architecture.

2.title: Day 2: Mostar
2.text: Visit the famous Mostar bridge and Ottoman bazaars.

3.title: Day 3: Dubrovnik
3.text: The Pearl of the Adriatic with medieval walls and crystal beaches.

4.title: Day 4: Kotor
4.text: Kotor Fjord in Montenegro, one of the Mediterranean's most beautiful spots.

5.title: Day 5: Budva
5.text: Beaches and nightlife on the Montenegrin coast.

6.title: Day 6: Tirana
6.text: Vibrant Albanian capital mixing communist and modern architecture.

7.title: Day 7: Ohrid
7.text: Europe's oldest lake with Byzantine monasteries.

reviews.r1: The Balkans are a hidden gem. History, nature and gastronomy blend perfectly.
reviews.r3: Loved the diversity of landscapes and cultures.

route_serengeti.title: Serengeti and Ngorongoro Safari
route_serengeti.descShort: See the great migration and the Big Five in Africa's most famous national parks.
route_serengeti.descLong: A Serengeti and Ngorongoro safari is a unique wildlife experience. Watch lions, elephants, rhinos, buffalo and leopards in their natural habitat.

1.title: Day 1: Arusha - Serengeti
1.text: Transfer from Arusha to Serengeti National Park.

2.title: Day 2: Seronera Valley
2.text: Full safari in the heart of the Serengeti.

3.title: Day 3: Great Migration
3.text: Search for wildebeest and zebra herds on their annual migration.

4.title: Day 4: Serengeti Kopjes
4.text: Explore the rock formations home to lions and leopards.

5.title: Day 5: Ngorongoro Crater
5.text: Descend into the crater, a unique ecosystem with high animal concentration.

6.title: Day 6: Crater floor
6.text: Last safari on the crater floor before return.

reviews.r1: Seeing lions hunting in the Serengeti was the most thrilling moment of my life.

route_annapurna.title: Annapurna Circuit
route_annapurna.descShort: One of the world's most spectacular treks crossing Thorong La at 5,416m.
route_annapurna.descLong: The Annapurna Circuit is one of the best treks worldwide, crossing Thorong La above 5,400 meters with spectacular Himalayan views.

1.title: Day 1: Besisahar - Bhulbhule
1.text: Start of the circuit in Nepal's subtropical valleys.

2.title: Day 2: Jagat - Dharapani
2.text: Gradual ascent following the Marsyangdi river.

3.title: Day 3: Chame
3.text: Entering the Annapurna area with first snowy peak views.

4.title: Day 4: Upper Pisang
4.text: Spectacular views of Annapurna II and III.

6.title: Day 6: Acclimatization day
6.text: Rest day in Manang to adapt to altitude.

8.title: Day 8: Thorong La Pass
8.text: The most challenging day: crossing the 5,416 m pass.

9.title: Day 9: Muktinath
9.text: Descent towards the pilgrimage site of Muktinath.

10.title: Day 10: Jomsom
10.text: Arrival to Jomsom completing the circuit.

reviews.r1: Annapurna is epic. Thorong La was extremely hard but the views are worth it.
reviews.r3: Physically demanding but emotionally rewarding. Acclimatization is crucial.

route_islandia.title: Ring Road Iceland
route_islandia.descShort: Drive the Ring Road discovering waterfalls, glaciers, northern lights and hot springs.
route_islandia.descLong: A full circle around Iceland via the famous Ring Road is a nature-lover's dream.

1.title: Day 1: Reykjavik - Vik
1.text: Route along the south coast with Seljalandsfoss and Skógafoss waterfalls.

4.title: Day 4: Lake Mývatn
4.text: Geothermal area with lava formations and natural baths.

5.title: Day 5: Akureyri
5.text: The northern capital with botanical gardens.

6.title: Day 6: Westfjords
6.text: Remote region with cliffs and marine wildlife.

7.title: Day 7: Snæfellsnes Peninsula
7.text: Iceland in miniature with volcanoes and beaches.

8.title: Day 8: Golden Circle
8.text: Geysir, Gullfoss and Þingvellir National Park.

reviews.r1: Iceland is another planet. The variety of landscapes is overwhelming.

route_angkor.title: Angkor Wat Temples
route_angkor.descShort: Discover the millenary temples of Angkor by bike with sunrise at Angkor Wat.
route_angkor.descLong: Angkor's temples are one of the world's most impressive archaeological complexes. Cycling allows exploring both main and hidden jungle temples.

1.title: Day 1: Angkor Wat and Angkor Thom
1.text: Sunrise at Angkor Wat followed by Angkor Thom and the Bayon.

2.title: Day 2: Jungle Temples
2.text: Ta Prohm, Preah Khan and Neak Pean.

3.title: Day 3: Banteay Srei
3.text: The most ornate temple with pink stone carvings.

route_sahara.title: Sahara Desert
route_sahara.descShort: Adventure in Erg Chebbi dunes with a night under the stars in a Berber camp.
route_sahara.descLong: The Sahara experience in Morocco is unforgettable. From Erg Chebbi's golden dunes to Berber hospitality.

1.title: Day 1: Marrakech - Ouarzazate
1.text: Cross the High Atlas towards the 'door of the desert'.

3.title: Day 3: Merzouga and Erg Chebbi
3.text: Camel ride at sunset and night in a Berber camp under the stars.

4.title: Day 4: Sunrise in the Dunes
4.text: Sunrise in the dunes before return.

reviews.r1: The night in the desert was magical. The starry sky is unforgettable.
reviews.r3: The dunes are impressive. A camel ride is a must.

route_noruega.title: Norwegian Fjords
route_noruega.descShort: Train journey through Norwegian fjords visiting Bergen, Flåm and Geirangerfjord.
route_noruega.descLong: Norwegian fjords offer some of Europe's most spectacular landscapes. Scenic trains, fjord ferries and charming towns.

1.title: Day 1: Bergen - Voss
1.text: From the Hanseatic city of Bergen into the mountains.

2.title: Day 2: Flåm Railway
2.text: The most beautiful railway descending to the fjord.

3.title: Day 3: Sognefjord
3.text: Cruise the longest and deepest Norwegian fjord.

5.title: Day 5: Ålesund
5.text: Art nouveau city rebuilt after the 1904 fire.

6.title: Day 6: Trondheim
6.text: Norway's third city with a gothic cathedral.

7.title: Day 7: Return to Bergen
7.text: Return to Bergen completing the fjords circuit.

reviews.r1: The fjords are spectacular. The Flåm train is truly the most beautiful I've taken.
reviews.r2: Norway is expensive but worth it.
reviews.r3: Perfect mix of nature and culture.

route_costarica.title: Costa Rica Adventure
route_costarica.descShort: Rainforest, paradise beaches and wildlife in Monteverde, Arenal and Manuel Antonio.
route_costarica.descLong: Costa Rica is biodiversity paradise with volcanoes, cloud forests and pristine beaches.

2.title: Day 2: Arenal Volcano and Hot Springs
2.text: Hike near the volcano and relax in natural hot springs.

3.title: Day 3: Monteverde Cloud Forest
3.text: Explore the cloud forest and its biodiversity.

4.title: Day 4: Canopy Tour
4.text: Zipline among tree canopies and hanging bridges.

6.title: Day 6: Manuel Antonio Beach
6.text: Beach day in the national park with monkeys and sloths.

8.title: Day 8: Corcovado National Park
8.text: One of the planet's most biodiverse places.

reviews.r1: Costa Rica is pure life. The amount of animals we saw was incredible.
reviews.r2: Perfect balance of adventure and relaxation.

route_muralla_china.title: Great Wall of China
route_muralla_china.descShort: Walk restored and wild sections of the Great Wall with stunning views.
route_muralla_china.descLong: Walking the Great Wall of China is touring history. This route mixes restored and wild sections for an authentic experience.

1.title: Day 1: Jinshanling
1.text: A restored but less touristic section with well-preserved watchtowers.

2.title: Day 2: Simatai and Wild Wall
2.text: A more challenging stretch with unrestored sections and spectacular views.

3.title: Day 3: Mutianyu
3.text: One of the most beautiful sections surrounded by forests.

reviews.r1: The Wall is more impressive than I imagined.
reviews.r2: Walking the wild Wall is a unique adventure.

route_ruta66.title: Classic Route 66
route_ruta66.descShort: From Chicago to Los Angeles down the mother road crossing America's heart.
route_ruta66.descLong: Route 66 is a trip through deep America, from Chicago skyscrapers to Santa Monica beaches, passing ghost towns and retro diners.

1.title: Day 1: Chicago - Springfield
1.text: Start in Chicago following the earliest historic stretches.

2.title: Day 2: St. Louis
2.text: The famous Gateway Arch and Missouri BBQ.

5.title: Day 5: Amarillo
5.text: The famous Cadillac Ranch in Texas.

6.title: Day 6: Santa Fe
6.text: Art and culture in New Mexico.

7.title: Day 7: Albuquerque
7.text: Southwest desert and native American culture.

8.title: Day 8: Flagstaff
8.text: Gateway to the Grand Canyon in Arizona.

9.title: Day 9: Grand Canyon
9.text: A must-see detour to one of the world's natural wonders.

14.title: Day 14: Santa Monica Pier
14.text: Epic finish at the iconic Pacific Pier.

reviews.r1: A nostalgic trip through classic America.
reviews.r2: The freedom of the road is real.
reviews.r3: Doing Route 66 was a childhood dream that exceeded expectations.
